CustomField.description: Required only when Implementation Type is 'Standard'. Specify which built-in framework action to execute (e.g., Get Records, Create Record). The available action types are defined by StandardActionHandler__mdt custom metadata records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Required only if 'Implementation Type' is 'Standard'. Enter the specific built-in action type this capability represents (e.g., GetRecords, CreateRecord).
CustomField.label: Standard Action Type
